title: OG Bachelorette Trista Sutter Stops By
description:
She was the first Bachelorette and the first success story of the franchise — and today Rachel and Becca are talking to Trista Sutter! Trista and the ladies discuss how the show has changed over the years and ways they think the integrity from some of the earlier seasons could be restored into the show today. 

Plus, Trista reveals her one regret from her season of the show.

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.

Thanks to our sponsors:
